DOC.brief_summary: This double-blind randomized trial evaluate efficacy intravenous infusion Paracetamol intrapartum analgesic first stage labour .
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Infusion Paracetamol Intrapartum Analgesia Labor
DOC.detailed_description: Comparison efficacy safety intravenous infusion paracetamol versus placebo ( intravenous sterile water infusion ) parturient woman active first phase labour require intrapartum analgesia .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1835 year . 2 . Primigravida . 3 . The gestational age 37 42 week . 4 . Patient seek analgesia . 5 . Single viable fetus . 6 . Vertex presentation . 7 . Spontaneous onset labor . 8 . 1st stage labor cervical dilatation 34 cm ( active phase ) . 1 . Extreme age ( 18above 35 ) . 2 . Multiparity . 3 . Multiple gestation . 4 . Malpresentation . 5 . Major degree cephalopelvic disproportion . 6 . Any medical disorder pregnancy e.g. , Rheumatic heart disease , Diabetes mellitus , Hypertension , Anemia . 7 . Induction labor . 8 . Cervical dilatation exceeds exceed 4 cm . 9 . Use kind analgesia recruitment study . 10 . Scared uterus . 11 . Fetal distress . 12 . Antepartum hemorrhage . 13 . Intrapartum bleeding . 14 . Polyhydramnios . 15 . Premature rupture membrane . 16 . Intra uterine infection . 17 . Hypersensitivity paracetamol .
